BTC Will Replace USD as the World’s Money

The main premise of bitcoin treasury is its ability to become world money before the USD collapses due to accelerated debasement. However, Bitcoin as the world’s money is not obvious to many due to various myths and misconceptions. We’ll show you how wrong that is.

Book Bitcoin Training Series

Why is it matter? Scroll down to learn more.

Myth #1

Bitcoin is the enemy of Rupiah

The truth is, unlike bitcoin, Rupiah is only a local money. So, Rupiah & bitcoin can co-exist perfectly. Bitcoin can even strengthen rupiah, used as reserve currency, for saving and global trade. We’ll show you the path to that. God gave us 40% of world geothermal & spacious area to harvest solar power. We can dominate future bitcoin mining, if our leader understand it.

Book Bitcoin Training Series

Myth #2

Bitcoin is haram & bad for society

Yes, bitcoin trading can be harmful. Bitcoin treasury’s not. With Ustadz Devin Halim, a LIPIA graduate, you’ll understand that: there’s no haram & harmful stuffs in bitcoin per se, at all. You’ll also understand there’s no religious ruling/encouragement to keep using gold and silver as money. Be very careful of bid’ah.

Book Bitcoin Training Series

Myth #3

Bitcoin will make bankers obsolete

Bitcoin explicitly oppose currency debasement & fractional-reserve banking — but not banking in general. In this training, we’ll revisit the banking history, to extrapolate the era of banking when the teleport-able gold (bitcoin) is already the main reserve currency and world currency.

Book Bitcoin Training Series

Myth #4

Bitcoin treasury is only for institution

Yes, bitcoin’s best use case is reserve currency for international trade. But, still, if individual is allowed to accumulate USD, why not bitcoin? In this training, we’ll teach how to properly buy, sell, store bitcoin, as well as do the accounting, tax disclosure. You can see this as a trial to our institutional bitcoin treasury consultation.

Book Bitcoin Training Series

Myth #5

Other cryptocurrency can beat bitcoin

Let’s say that there’s a cryptocurrency shares bitcoin’s supply limitation, mining requirement to mint new coin, and anonymous creator. The problem is, at this point, it’s impossible to make that more popular than bitcoin. Especially if the creator is an anon. Just take a look at other coins with largest market cap, no one shares bitcoin characteristics above. No specific training for this.

Book Bitcoin Training Series

Myth #6

Bitcoin network can go extinct

We’ll show you why the only things that can kill & erase bitcoin database, are the things that will kill & erase humanity as well. There’s no specific training for this. We’ll share this as the intro of all training above, just right after a hands-on demo of bitcoin transaction. Book the training now.
